clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Ojeok-san on Korean Patients With Cold Hypersensitivity in the Hands and Feet
clinical_study.official_title: Efficacy and Safety of Ojeok-san on Korean Patients With Cold Hypersensitivity in the Hands and Feet - A Randomized, Double-blinded, Placebo Controlled, Multi-center Pilot Study

collaborator.agency: Kyung Hee University Hospital at Gangdong
Semyung University second affiliated oriental medical hospital at Chungju

clinical_study.source: Gachon University Gil Oriental Medical Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: The Purpose of this trial is to investigate the efficacy and safety of Ojeok-san(OJS) on Korean Patients With Cold Hypersensitivity in the Hands

primary_outcome.measure: Changes from baseline in visual analogue scale

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes from baseline in body temperature
Changes from baseline in cold stress test
secondary_outcome.description: similar to the cold stimulation test
Body temperature, blood pressure, pulse rate
Levels of AST, ALT and r-GTP

other_outcome.description: This questionnaire is a traditional medicine researcher self-developed questionnaire for collecting general symptoms of patients with Cold Hypersensitivity in the Hands and feet

This tool is a traditional medicine researcher self-developed questionnaire of screening for patients with Cold Hypersensitivity in the Hands and feet In this trial, we will assess the validity of the tool.
